Author: artem.pikulin#0794
Content: @miles Hi! I've checked your swap status on the seednode and can see that other side swap was completed with refund. Due to the bug of MM2 (https://github.com/KomodoPlatform/atomicDEX-API/issues/502) your payment is stuck until MM2 is updated in HyperDEX bundle. But once you update the app with new MM2 it will be refunded. Please ensure that you don't delete the app data since it will be harder to recover if MM2 database is removed.

Author: miles#6381
Content: @artem.pikulin thanks so much for the follow up!! I actually checked git on the weekend and saw you had been busy!! Still have the swap in hyperdex so will wait for team to update mm2. Loving mm2 btw with AtomicDEX, hyperdex  and chainswap - great work

Content: We will get a build out asap.

Author: artem.pikulin#0794
Content:
@hyperDEX Latest HyperDEX nightly doesn't use the latest MM2 version, at least .deb package downloaded from https://github.com/atomiclabs/hyperdex-nightlies/releases/tag/v0.0.0-e5713db-19.9.2.1807
```
/opt/HyperDEX Nightly/resources/app.asar.unpacked/marketmaker/bin/linux$ ./marketmaker 
03 10:01:12, mm2:144] AtomicDEX MarketMaker 2.0.1072_mm2_90c5ba85d_Linux
```
This commit is almost 1 month old: https://github.com/KomodoPlatform/atomicDEX-API/commit/90c5ba85df5f57b09df12d1df6e78aef2f4c3c9c
Endless loop waiting for tx spend fix was pushed on next day after the commit that is used by HyperDEX app currently.

Author: artem.pikulin#0794
Content: https://github.com/KomodoPlatform/atomicDEX-API/commit/07921892ab65ba945105ecafca50c8e917e6b1f7

Author: artem.pikulin#0794
Content: Please make sure that HyperDEX nightly is using the most recent MM2 version.
